title: New Zealand Mirror. No. 50. Our neighbour the sea
brief_description: The sea in New Zealand life. Diving for shell-fish; making paua shell jewellery; sailing; trawling and other types of fishing, including big-game; boatbuilding; life-saving carnivals; water-skiing; family beach parties.
